Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.inner

Class InputController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.inner.InputController
public class InputController extends Object
This Class, with the help of the TurnController class gives methods to check if communications between controller and model are legal or not
